name: Sakuraa Nihongo Resource Centre
overview:
Sakuraa Nihongo Resource Centre (SNRC) is the language division of the liste decade old enterprise. SNRC offers Japanese Language Proficiency Test, JLPT Levels N5, N4 (for beginners) & N3 (Intermediate Level),Japanese translation & interpretation services.

How is SNRC different?

By virtue of its background, SNRC has a distinct edge in terms of the language course targeted at professionals. Effective counseling to ensure appropriate grasp of the language. Excellent Testimonials and credentials. This should be sufficient proof of our capabilities. Innovative training methodologies that have been adopted by SNRC, based on our experience with a wide range of student audience like IT Professionals, Businessmen, Professors, Management and other Graduates.

Various Japanese Language Courses for individuals at SNRC

JLPT COURSES:

JLPT N5 80 Hrs. / 40 Sessions

JLPT N4 90 Hrs. / 45 Sessions

JLPT N3 200 Hrs. / 100 Sessions

JLPT N2 300 Hrs. / 150 Sessions

Please visit us for more details http://www.snrc.co.in or call us 080-42628200
